solution.linktext: What are my support options for online services incentives?
Frequently Asked Question on OSA Claim

supportoption.title: Submit an issue
supportoption.description: Submit your questions/issues and an agent will contact you within 24 business hours to discuss your submission.
supportoption.linkurl: http://www.microsoftpartnersupport.com/create-incident?mpnid=NA&email=erebates@microsoft.com&supporttopicid_l1=Incentives and Payouts&supporttopicid_l2=Online Service Advisor&supporttopicid_l3=Support/Article Directory&locale=en-eg&language=EN" target="_blank
